title: Cozy Garden Condo.
description: Cozy Garden Condo. This community is situated high on the hill above the Historic Town of New Hope and Delaware River. Enter this one bedroom home through your own private courtyard, surrounded by privacy fence, gate and flower beds filled with perennial plants and flowers, a perfect spot to hang out with your summer morning coffee. This first floor garden condo has an open floorplan concept where the living room, kitchen and dining area flows together. The spacious living room is painted in warm colors with a small step up into kitchen area, offering a large oversized countertop, perfect for the Chef in the family to try that new recipe while your guests seated in the bar stools can rate your new culinary creations. There is room for a small dining table in the kitchen area, but some prefer the use of dining room, living room combination instead. The bedroom has a wall of closets and large windows overlooking the woods and your private garden room. The garden room was recently weather proofed with a new ceiling, a great spot for an evening barbecue or a lazy afternoon, maybe with your latest read or simply watching the local wildlife. The community offers resort style pools and amenities and is within walking distance to New Hope, Lambertville and the Delaware River, no need to find a parking spot. The area offers so many fabulous Restaurants, shops as well as theatre and music, the area has for a long time been home to many respected artists and writers as well as many other renowned artists, you will see why once you start to explore the area. This is a great home. if you commute the buses will take you right into Manhattan, you are never far from all the major Northeast roadways to get you either south towards Philadelphia (50 min) or North towards Manhattan (90 min) and Boston.

title: Charming 3BR House in Fabulous Location! Utilities included!
description:
**PLEASE NOTE: Rent is $650/week. House is only available 5/15 - 6/28. This is for the full house only.**
Our historic 3 bedroom home is on a gorgeous block just next to the famous Italian Market. A quick stroll to happening E. Passyunk Ave, and not too far from the shopping of Rittenhouse and culture & history of Old City, it's a perfect base to explore Philly! Nearly any university is very easily accessible from the location.
We love that we're directly (literally!) across the street from a family friendly park, and that we're surrounded by some of the best pizza in the city. There's good coffee everywhere, a dog park a few blocks away, and many of the best restaurants in the city - Italian, Thai, Vietnamese...and lots more!
We're a ten minute walk from the subway and right on multiple bus lines. This is also a perfect place if you're a walker or biker! Street parking in the neighborhood isn't bad either. Our street is clean, quiet, and very friendly.
One thing we love about our home is its openness compared to other homes of the same era + the whole place gets wonderful natural light. The first floor features a fully equipped kitchen open to the living room as well as a small back patio - perfect for a morning coffee. The second floor has the full bathroom, an office, a baby's room (crib and full bed) that can easily be temporarily converted to another space, a roof deck, and a hidden reading nook!
The third floor has another two rooms - the master bedroom (queen bed) and a guest room/office. We have amazing views of City Hall & the Philly skyline, and a home theater, complete with surround sound!
We have a partially finished basement with a half-bath. It's got a washer and dryer and good storage.

Your new home will also be close to outdoor recreation like hiking trails such as Runyon Canyon and Griffith. Getting around LA is easy. The apartment was recently treated to a full remodel, and EVERYTHING was redone! Enjoy updated hardwood throughout, the updated kitchen with granite countertops, and stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher! The bathroom is remodeled too. The apartment features recessed lighting and updated fixtures throughout. The windows have been replaced with large double-pane windows that let in plenty of light, but not sound! The unit also features plenty of storage space with multiple closets.
This apartment comes with in-unit laundry and an assigned parking spot just steps from your front door!
